gw.api.contact

Class TooLooseContactCreateCriteriaException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • com.guidewire.pl.web.controller.UserDisplayableException
            • gw.api.contact.ContactSubtypeSpecificException
              • gw.api.contact.TooLooseContactCreateCriteriaException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasErrorInfo, java.io.Serializable

    public class TooLooseContactCreateCriteriaException
extends ContactSubtypeSpecificException
    An exception thrown when an ABContact lacks required information for creation. The exception message depends on the ABContact's subtype and a specified country. Please see the displaykeys that begin with "Java.TooLooseContactCreateCriteriaException." to see how subtypes and countries map to specific displaykeys.
    See Also:
